titleStmt.title: A goodly dyalogue betwene knowledge and symplicitie

publicationStmt.publisher: By Anthony Scoloker and Willyam Seres. Dwellyng wythout Aldersgate. Cum gratia et priuilegio ad imprimendum solum,
